data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Firstly, there are a number of government bodies as well as non-governmental organizations consistently working on the preservation of wildlife habitats. Wildlife must have places to find food, shelter and raise their young. Parks, reserves, and other open spaces benefit wildlife by providing habitat, while also providing us with great places to visit and enjoy. Programs of those organizations have brought some of these species back from the brink through captive breeding and reintroduction programs. Also, you can always see people in uniform that represents their organizations. They are there to give pedestrians a brief on the crisis wildlife in the country are facing, and persuade people to donate, even if the donation is as small as several dollars per week, which is just the cost for a cup of coffee, still, it would make a difference in the long run. Apart from that, to minimize the number of wildlife killed on roads in my country, road signage is being used on most of the country roads. It reminds drivers to be conscious of animal behavior near roadsides. (178字)
data.referenceText: Describe the conservation efforts of governments and organizations in your country.
data.referenceTranslate: 请描述贵国政府和组织在保护方面所做的努力。（这个保护可以是环境、野生动物、文化古迹等）
